title: Hunter
description: Hunter   When you’re a king, everything is a game.   And winning with a stacked deck is a sure thing.   Until the wildcard comes along. And her kiss makes you forget your last name… but not hers.   The girl who loves to hate me is completely off limits.   She’s my little sister’s best friend.   And it’s too bad, knowing I might just be the only one who sees her... the real Poppy.   But to keep her safe, I have to pretend she’s invisible.   Because I’m not the only one watching. Or hunting her.   Poppy   I’m a nobody… until everyone realizes who I am.  And my seven minutes in heaven turns into hell.   They all think they can use me to climb the Rosewood High royalty ladder. They are wrong.   They can’t break me. But he can... without even trying.    Zayn Hunter.   My best friend’s brother doesn’t want to use me.   He wants something else.   Something he can’t have. Me.   Yet he’s always there, living up to his name.   Stalking me, like I’m his prey... Maybe I am.   But I can’t help but dream about what will happen if he finally catches me. Dear Readers,HUNTER is a dark high school bully romance, and the fifth in the emotional and addictive Rosewood High series.
author: Tracy Lorraine
